title: Dr. Peter Hotez on the Importance of COVID-19 Vaccines | Eddie Murphy
itunes:title: Dr. Peter Hotez on the Importance of COVID-19 Vaccines | Eddie Murphy
description:
Governor Andrew Cuomo's harassment scandal mounts, Jaboukie Young-White discusses COVID-19 vaccines with Dr. Peter Hotez, and Eddie Murphy talks about his sequel movie "Coming 2 America."


In honor of Women's History Month, help level the playing field for girls of color in STEM by donating at dailyshow.com/BlackGirlsCode.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
